DOC.brief_summary: To test efficacy CP-751,871 combine docetaxel prednisone treatment prostate cancer refractory hormone therapy
DOC.brief_title: Study CP-751,871 Combination With Docetaxel Prednisone Patients With Hormone Insensitive Prostate Cancer ( HRPC )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis metastatic , progressive hormone refractory prostate cancer Adequate bone marrow , liver kidney function Previous treatment chemotherapy
